titleStmt.title: Diuine fancies digested into epigrammes, meditations, and observations / by Fra. Quarles.
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for Iohn Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Dunstans churchyard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Numbers 81-88 repeated and 89-96 deleted in the pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
